import React from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faCreditCard } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' const Cart: React.FunctionComponent = () => { const data = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('items') as string) const deleteItem = (e: any): any => { const index = e.target.getAttribute('data-key') const listValue = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('items') as string) listValue.splice(index, 1) localStorage.setItem('items', JSON.stringify(listValue)) window.location.reload() } const deleteAll = (): any => { localStorage.removeItem('items') const itemsArray: any = [] localStorage.setItem('items', JSON.stringify(itemsArray)) window.location.reload() } const result = data.reduce(function (tot: any, arr: any) { return tot + arr.id }, 0) const tax = 15 const value = 2 const unit = 3 return (
{data.map((dat: any, key: any) => ( ))}
Product Qtd Quantity Unit price Total price

{dat.name}
{unit} {value * unit}

Order Details

Shipping and additional costs are calculated based on values you have entered

Subtotal
{result}
Tax
{tax}
Total
{result + tax}
) } export default Cart
